turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Community band.
turn.1: What is meant by Community band?
turn.2: Community band A community band is a concert band or brass band ensemble composed of volunteer (non-paid) amateur musicians in a particular geographic area.
turn.3: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.4: It may be sponsored by the local (municipal) government or self-supporting.
turn.6: These groups rehearse regularly and perform at least once a year.
turn.8: Some bands are also marching bands, participating in parades and other outdoor events.
turn.10: Although they are volunteer musical organizations, community bands may employ an Artistic Director (conductor) or various operational staff.
turn.11: What other names are given to the band?
turn.12: Community bands can also be known as "town," "citizen," "municipal" or "civic" bands.
